Application

Home page


On the home page the users can search for a product, which should be written in hungarian. Later we will expand it to other languages as well. Without logging in ore registering if we search for something, we will arrive at the search results' page.

Search results page (logged out)


If we are not logged in, we will just see a simple list of the results of our search. We can see several products with their prices and from which supermarket they are. Currently we just list the products of supermarkets Tesco and Aldi, but later we will add some more supermarkets.

Register page


We can sign up on the register page, clicking on "Sign Up" on the menu at the right corner of the page. It will redirect us to the register page.

Login page


Once we are signed up, we can log in on the login page, similarly as we did with the registration.

Search page (logged in)


After we logged in, we are on a search page, where we can look for products similarly as on the home page.

Search results page (logged in)


The difference between the logged out version is that now we can add products to our "cart" with the "Add to cart" button. If we want to, we can set the quantity of the products, thus we can add e.g. 3 milks to the cart at the same time. With "+" and "-" buttons we can increase and decrease the quantity.

Cart page


In our cart, we can check what products we chose therefore our grocery list is starting to get ready and we can see what would be the total price. If we changed our mind, we can remove products from the cart, and we can remove multiple products at the same time, we can set the numbers with the "+" and "-" buttons as we did on the search results page.

Log out

Once we finished using the cart we can log out, by clicking on the button "Logout" at the right corner of the page.
